donor_name: GOVERNMENT OF THE PROVINCE OF BALOCHISTAN
outputs.output_descr:
1: Enabling Environment for Mainstreaming SLM Practices Created
2: Capacity for Sustainable Land Management Enhanced
3: Sustainable Land Management Principles Mainstreamed into Land Use Planning
4: Participatory Feasibility Studies (Pilot Projects) for Demonstrating SLM Practices conducted
5: Monitoring, Learning, Adaptive Feedback and Evaluation.

project_descr: Sustainable Land Management to Combat Desertification in Pakistan- Phase-I
project_title: (ECC) Sustainable Land Mgmt  to Combat Desertification
